Data: 1.50pm Andrew Strauss has won the toss and England will bat.
Lee to Strauss, no run good line immediately, just outside off and straightening a fraction, Strauss leaves it
Lee to Strauss, 1 run Strauss gets England off the mark with a single to deep square leg as Lee swings one on to the pads
Lee to Prior, no run ah, really good swing away from Prior, who pushes the bat outside off and fortunately for him, doesn't get an edge
Lee to Prior, no run straighter this time and Prior leaves it

Lee to Prior, OUT Prior is gone in the first over! Ah, the Prior opening experiment is really not working for England. Lee has angled one back in and Prior is struck on the pad, low down, and given out. He asks for a review but that is plumb. He's gone!
Lee to Trott, no run Trott gets behind his first ball and defends back down the pitch
Bollinger to Strauss, 1 run oh, an edge immediately but Strauss gets away with it, as the ball flies wide of second slip. That was a genuine edge, not a deliberate glide
Bollinger to Trott, 1 run Trott walks across and works a single to square leg to get off the mark

Bollinger to Strauss, 2 runs banged in short of a length and Strauss is on to the pull, there's a man in the deep but he can't prevent a second run, although a quicker throw might have had Strauss in trouble
Bollinger to Strauss, no run defended back to Bollinger
Bollinger to Strauss, 2 runs on the pads, not a great delivery from Bollinger, and Strauss whips it behind square leg
Bollinger to Strauss, no run solidly defended as Bollinger probes outside off, he hasn't found any swing in this over
Lee to Trott, no run Lee hits the right line just outside off again, and Trott defends

Lee to Trott, no run there's an lbw shout from Lee, at first he was hesitant but then really convinced himself. Gary Baxter says not out, and Trott was on the walk and hit above the roll, so you'd have to think that was too high
Lee to Trott, 1 run pulled through square leg
Lee to Strauss, no run just outside off again, Strauss pushes to cover
Lee to Strauss, no run again Brett Lee gives Strauss no width, and the batsman defends
Lee to Strauss, 1 run Strauss whips one from middle and leg through square leg to pick up a single
Bollinger to Strauss, no run full and straight from Bollinger, Strauss clips to midwicket
Bollinger to Strauss, no run banged in short and Strauss goes for the pull, but gets a bottom edge on to his body
Bollinger to Strauss, 1 run this time Strauss does get the pull away through midwicket, but Clarke has set a man in the deep for that very shot, and Marsh keeps it to a single
Bollinger to Trott, 1 run a quick single now as Trott pushes gently past the bowler, Hastings at mid-off dives across to prevent any more than a single
Bollinger to Strauss, no run nips back in a touch off the seam, Strauss punches to cover
Bollinger to Strauss, no run driven down to mid-on and again Hastings does the fielding

Lee to Trott, (no ball) FOUR runs there's the first boundary of the day, and what a good cover-drive it is, picking the gap and timing it to perfection. And to add to Lee's frustration, it was a no-ball
Lee to Trott, no run Lee bowls the slower ball and for some reason, despite it being a free hit, Trott doesn't have a swing! Very odd
Lee to Trott, 1 run edged away through a vacant fourth slip area, and it's collected at third man
Lee to Strauss, no run good fielding at point, Strauss went for the big drive and it was saved by a diving Marsh
Lee to Strauss, 1 run Strauss tries to force one through cover and doesn't time it, but gets a quick single all the same
Lee to Trott, no run driven away to cover but Trott can't find the gap
Lee to Trott, no run pushed back past the bowler but straight to mid-off
Hastings to Strauss, no run he pushes it across Strauss, who cuts straight to point

Hastings to Strauss, FOUR runs Strauss throws the kitchen sink at this one and almost gets caught! He's slashed hard at a cut and Smith at point hurled himself to his left, just couldn't get a fingertip to it
Hastings to Strauss, FOUR runs Strauss is going after Hastings! He's gone over wide mid-off now, and this is a much safer shot, finding the gap and the boundary
Hastings to Strauss, no run straighter line now and Strauss nudges to mid off
Hastings to Strauss, 1 run clipped through midwicket for another run
Hastings to Trott, 1 run a bit too straight for Trott, who enjoys clipping one off his hips through square leg
Lee to Trott, no run ah, that's a ripper, quick and bouncing more than Trott expected, he looks to dab a cut away and it whizzes over his top edge
Lee to Trott, 1 run Trott takes one from outside off and whips it through midwicket
Lee to Strauss, 1 run Strauss goes for the pull yet again, and once more it's collected at deep square leg, he's struggling to find the boundary from that shot
Lee to Trott, 1 run Lee gives Trott a bit of width now and a solid cover drive could easily have raced through to the boundary, but Clarke makes a very good diving save to his left
Lee to Strauss, no run Strauss drives a bump ball back over the head of Lee
Lee to Strauss, 2 runs a slower bouncer this time and Strauss swivels a pull behind square leg, it looks like making the rope but Smith makes a diving save
Hastings to Trott, no run Trott decides he too will go after Hastings, advancing down the pitch, but he misses his attempted cut
Hastings to Trott, 1 wide bouncer, but it's too high and it's called a wide
Hastings to Trott, 1 run Trott walks across outside off and guides a wide-ish one to third man
Hastings to Strauss, 1 run a bit too short from Hastings and Strauss pulls to deep midwicket
Hastings to Trott, 1 run guided away to third man as Hastings makes Trott play to off, not getting too straight to him
Hastings to Strauss, 1 run clipped off middle by Strauss, who gets a single behind square leg

Hastings to Trott, OUT oh no! A comedy of errors from both teams, and the end result is a run-out, but who has to go? Trott pushed to midwicket, where there was a misfield by Hussey, who knocks it down to mid-on, where Doherty underarmed to the bowler's end and missed the stumps - but by this stage Strauss had turned back halfway through the single, and both batsmen were racing to the bowl
Bollinger to Trott, no run a full toss to start with, and it's edged into the ground and through to Haddin
Bollinger to Trott, 2 runs fullish and straight, it's clipped through square leg
Bollinger to Trott, 1 run driven to cover and Trott gets a single
Bollinger to Bell, no run Bell pushes his first ball to cover
Bollinger to Bell, no run ah, big swing from Bell, who tries an expansive cover drive and doesn't get any bat on a ball angled across him
Bollinger to Bell, no run guided to point and can't find a run
Hastings to Trott, no run Trott tries to swivel a pull but gets an edge on to his body, Haddin is still up to the stumps for Hastings
Hastings to Trott, no run pushed wide of mid-off and can't find a run as Lee does the fielding
Hastings to Trott, no run clipped to short midwicket
Hastings to Trott, FOUR runs Hastings forces Trott wide of off and he has a swing, getting a thick edge that flies safely away through the vacant slip region for a boundary
Hastings to Trott, 1 run guided very deliberately this time to third man
Hastings to Bell, 1 run and Bell gets off the mark with a similar guide to third man, just opening the face
Bollinger to Bell, FOUR runs good shot from Bell, he uses his feet and then forces it through cover and it races away to the boundary
Bollinger to Bell, 1 run another guide to third man, Bell opens the face and runs the ball along the ground
Bollinger to Trott, no run Trott dances down the pitch now and tries to slam Bollinger through cover, but he can't make contact with the ball
Bollinger to Trott, 1 run clipped through square leg
Bollinger to Bell, 2 runs Bell walks across almost Trott-like now, and clips one uppishly from leg stump over square leg, picks up a couple of runs
Bollinger to Bell, no run tries to go for a late cut this time but doesn't connect
Hastings to Trott, 1 run Trott now flicks it from outside off behind square leg and that's very good fielding by Smith on the boundary to keep that to a single
Hastings to Bell, no run wide of off now and Bell cuts to point
Hastings to Bell, no run defended right down at his feet

Hastings to Bell, no run ah, good slower ball from Hastings and he goes really wide of off, drawing Bell into a swipe and he almost falls out of his crease as Haddin whips the bails off, but Bell is safe
Hastings to Bell, 1 run quicker and bouncier now, and Bell steers it to third man
Hastings to Trott, 1 run oh, another slower one and Hastings almost creates a chance as Trott drives it back past the bowler, in the air but out of reach, and gets a single
Watson to Trott, 1 run flicked through square leg
Watson to Bell, 1 run angling in to the pads, and it's clipped through square leg
Watson to Trott, 1 run fullish and just outside off, Trott opens the face and gets another run to third man, who has been busy in the last few overs
Watson to Bell, no run Bell tries a big drive outside off and misses - Haddin makes the take as the ball cannons into his palms
Watson to Bell, no run good accuracy from Watson, and Bell pushes to off

Watson to Bell, OUT gone! Good return catch from Watson! Bell tried to work it from outside off through the leg side, a-la Trott, but got a leading edge and Watson hurled himself to his left to take a very sharp catch
Hastings to Trott, 1 run worked through midwicket again for another single

Hastings to Morgan, no run Hastings asks the question for lbw here, but Paul Reiffel says no, and to the naked eye that looked to have pitched well outside leg from Hastings' angle from over the wicket

Hastings to Morgan, no run another appeal! For caught at slip this time - the Australians think there was an edge on to the pad, and Watson took the catch cleanly. Reiffel says no, and Clarke wants a review. But that was a great decision, there were two noises but it was the front flap of the pad and then the back thigh, no bat involved. Morgan survives!
Hastings to Morgan, no run driven to mid-off
Hastings to Morgan, no run fuller and straighter from Hastings, and Morgan works it to leg
Hastings to Morgan, no run cut away to point and can't find the gap
Watson to Trott, 1 run Trott shuffles across his stumps and flicks a full ball to deep midwicket for a jogged single
Watson to Morgan, no run Morgan has a flirt outside off stump. He looks out of nick, nothing more or less complicated that that
Watson to Morgan, no run having played and missed the last time, Morgan opts to leave all alone this time round
Watson to Morgan, no run a rare feeling of bat on ball, not quite out the middle but enough to trickle to cover. Morgan still pinned on 0
Watson to Morgan, no run Watson operating on a very tight offstump line and Morgan is half forward to defend
Watson to Morgan, no run more secure on this, Morgan talking a fuller stride forward into this drive to mid-off
Smith to Trott, 1 run wow, what a start! Huge, filthy full-toss, should have ended up in the stands but Trott has barely middled a ball all innings so wheels this to deep midwicket
Smith to Morgan, 1 run another full toss and it allows Morgan to get off the mark, patting down to long-off
Smith to Trott, no run Smith finds a good line and length this time and it's carefully defended
Smith to Trott, no run flicked off the legs to midwicket
Smith to Trott, 1 run neatly pushed to long-on but good length from Smith
Smith to Morgan, no run nothing on offer here for Morgan, carefully patted back to the bowler
Watson to Trott, no run Watson hitting a good length and line and Trott gets half forward to defend around his front pad
Watson to Trott, no run Watson not trying to do anything special just holding a good line and Trott seems unable to do much about it
Watson to Trott, no run short ball, slower ball bouncer that Trott pops under. He could have stood up and worked a single but no
Watson to Trott, 1 run another slowish bouncer and Trott this time works it around the corner
Watson to Morgan, no run Watson adjusts his line to suitably fit the left hander and Morgan pops forward to defend with low hands
Watson to Morgan, 1 run to counter Watson's lack of pace Morgan is batting two feet out of his crease. It works in the sense that his cover drive is very well timed to deep cover
Smith to Morgan, no run Smith has settled and tosses this nicely up and Morgan pushes back to the bowler
Smith to Morgan, 1 run tossed up again and this time Morgan beats the bowler to jog a single
Smith to Trott, 1 run excellent line and length here and Trott carefully drives to cover
Smith to Morgan, 1 run worked back wide of the bowler
Smith to Trott, 1 run Trott skips up the wicket a fraction and flicks a single into the leg side
Smith to Morgan, no run short ball, poor ball, but Morgan can't quite nail it. Instead his cut finds extra cover
Bollinger to Morgan, no run short and wide but Morgan's swish outside off finds fresh air
Bollinger to Morgan, 1 run thickish outside edge outside off stump this time. Morgan just needs to get through this horrible period
Bollinger to Trott, 1 run Trott tries to cut a ball which is a touch close to him so ends up chopping untidily down to third man
Bollinger to Morgan, no run Morgan very carefully gets everything behind his backfoot defence
Bollinger to Morgan, 1 leg bye Bollinger gets his line wrong, slipping this onto the pads but Morgan misses his leg-side whip and it bobbles off the pads
Smith to Morgan, 1 run Smith tosses one up outside off stump and Morgan drives down to mid-off
Smith to Trott, FOUR runs boundary! Precious boundary! We've not had many. Trott gets down on one knee and sweeps a full ball powerfully to the square leg rope
Smith to Trott, 2 runs this time Smith drops short and Trott is on the cut, playing it well enough to pick up a couple
Smith to Trott, no run ooh, Trott tries to flick to leg and it loops up off the pads
Smith to Trott, 1 run Trott on the sweep again, not as effective here but a single is valuable

Smith to Morgan, FOUR runs oooh, almost the most sensational catch at long-off, flying to his left. Morgan was down the wicket and driving not quite with perfect timing but it brings him his first boundary
Bollinger to Trott, no run Trott is solidly and solemnly behind a defence after all that excitement
Bollinger to Trott, 1 run Trott on the pull, always a scary preposition, didn't get much of it and it looped up high off the bat heading one bounce to deep midwicket
Bollinger to Trott, no run Trott gets a full ball outside off stump and tries to work it to leg. Such is his way

Bollinger to Trott, 1 run this is well played, Trott up on his toes to a good delivery outside off stump and dropping into the covers for a swift single. Trott's in trouble though. The throw hit him on the back of the leg and it seems to have hit the back of left knee. He's writhing around in pain until the painkillers are brought out
Bollinger to Morgan, no run Bollinger finishes a good over well, hitting back of a length around off stump. Morgan finally middles a ball but it's just a block back to the bowler
Doherty to Trott, 1 run starts well enough, rolling the ball on a decent length around middle and worked to deep fine leg
Doherty to Morgan, 2 runs ooh, Morgan is giving his edge a real working over today. This again slips off the outside edge through where slip could have been down to third man
Doherty to Morgan, 1 wide oops, this is thrown up far too wide outside off stump
Doherty to Morgan, no run worked carefully to midwicket
Doherty to Morgan, no run oooh, play and miss outside off. Nicely tossed up by Doherty and Morgan flashed and missed. Haddin whipped the bails off, as much to prove he can as anything
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run back of length here and Morgan hops outside leg stump to cut to deep point
Doherty to Trott, 1 run Trott is working his singles well enough now, getting forward to pat to cover
Hussey to Trott, 1 run good start around off stump and it's chopped to point for one
Hussey to Morgan, 1 run Morgan gets down the wicket to pat a single to cover
Hussey to Trott, no run carefully defended back down the wicket
Hussey to Trott, 1 run Trott edges down the wicket and works to long-on
Hussey to Morgan, 2 runs Morgan is down on one knee very early here and flipping a type of sweep shot very fine
Hussey to Morgan, 2 runs Morgan's struggles continue! This is so close. Top edge from an attempted cut loops just over point
Doherty to Trott, 1 run Trott is looking far more solid and pushes neatly wide of cover
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run Morgan works a single around the corner, using the angle from over the wicket
Doherty to Trott, 1 run Trott has fifty and fittingly gets there by patting a needless single wide of point. He's played excellently after a tricky start
Doherty to Morgan, no run Morgan cannot find bat on ball. Here he skips outside leg and aims a cut but it shoots under his bat
Doherty to Morgan, 2 runs neatly played this time, half-volley outside off stump and whipped to straightish midwicket. That was well timed, for once
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run good finish to the over, fullish around off and Morgan bunts it down the wicket
Hussey to Morgan, FOUR runs ah brilliant shot here. Morgan down the wicket and driving wide of long-off, timed this very well and it rushed to the rope
Hussey to Morgan, 2 runs nicely done again, Morgan suddenly finding the middle of the bat. Down the wicket and flicking into a gap wide between long-on and midwicket
Hussey to Morgan, 2 runs misfield this time earns Morgan a couple. It was worked to square leg where a needless fumble allowed Morgan to come back

Hussey to Morgan, OUT oh no! Filthy long hop is nailed to midwicket where Clarke holds a fine catch. Morgan has fallen to some awful deliveries this series. Just as he was looking good he's smashed a pull shot straight to midwicket
Hussey to PD Collingwood, 1 run ooh, so nearly all over straight away for him. Collingwood inside-edging his first ball this far wide of leg stump
Hussey to Trott, no run Trott is looking solid in defence

Doherty to PD Collingwood, OUT Doherty strikes! Collingwood's miserable run of form continues. This is pretty awful, he's missed a straight ball. Just played down the line of middle, feet stuck to the ground, and it hit off stump
Doherty to Yardy, 1 run Yardy solidly clips his first ball wide of mid-on for a single
Doherty to Trott, no run Trott pats this into the off side
Doherty to Trott, no run angling in from around the wicket and Trott aims an ambitious late cut and it slides to short third man
Doherty to Trott, no run pushed to extra cover, Yardy set off for an impossible single before being firmly sent back by Trott
Doherty to Trott, no run again it's very carefully defended. Excellent over from Doherty
Hussey to Yardy, 1 run Yardy gets a full toss outside off stump but he's already in position to sweep so can only dab around the corner
Hussey to Trott, 1 run Trott happily works a single down the ground
Hussey to Yardy, 1 run Yardy plays this well driving into the off side
Hussey to Trott, 1 run full toss but Trott is in careful mood so pulls all along the ground to long-on
Hussey to Yardy, 2 runs another full toss outside off and Yardy is down on one knee again, flipping this to fine leg
Hussey to Yardy, 1 wide shoved down the leg side, too far for the umpire's liking
Hussey to Yardy, 1 run Yardy on the paddle again. He's looked fluent so far, the first of all the England batsmen really. Gets this down to fine leg to pinch the strike
Doherty to Yardy, no run very nicely played here, Yardy skipping down the wicket and driving solidly to cover
Doherty to Yardy, 1 run attempted drive again slips off the outside edge wide of point
Doherty to Trott, 1 run Trott has looked in no bother for a while and he picks off another single pushing down to long-off
Doherty to Yardy, OUT Yardy's gone. Soft dismissal, simple dismissal. He edged down the wicket and chipped it gently back to Doherty
Doherty to Wright, no run oops, Doherty starts wide outside off stump
Doherty to Wright, no run this is much straighter and Wright is a textbook picture of defence
Lee to Trott, 1 run starts full and straight to Trott who drives to extra cover, scampering a very swift single
Lee to Wright, no run this is outside off stump and Wright shoulders arms
Lee to Wright, no run nicely played by Wright. Gets a very straight bat behind a very straight ball
Lee to Wright, no run in another mood Wright would slash wildly at this but here he solemnly shoulders arms to a widish ball outside off
Lee to Wright, no run this time he aims a drive at a zippy outswinger and he was late on it, bat far away from body and never looked like connecting
Lee to Wright, no run after the aberration the ball before Wright reverts to a studious leave-alone
Doherty to Trott, no run Doherty is causing all sorts of trouble. Imagine that! Gets some spin here and it slides off the edge to short third man
Doherty to Trott, no run solidly driven but straight to cover. Good pressure building by Doherty
Doherty to Trott, 1 run hint of width allows Trott to chop a single to third man
Doherty to Wright, 1 run Wright is away with a neat drive wide of cover
Doherty to Trott, 1 run touch of air here from Doherty, tossing it up outside off stump and Trott leans into a drive
Doherty to Wright, no run very resolute and careful defence. Wright not taking any risks at this stage and why would he
Lee to Trott, 1 run Lee continues after the refuelling with a fullish ball outside off, Trott crisply drives wide of cover
Lee to Wright, 1 wide too far outside off stump for the batsman, and the umpire
Lee to Wright, no run nervy looking drive here from Wright. Bat far away from pad and it's fielded smartly at cover
Lee to Wright, no run very good, very sharp bouncer. This really zipped through Wright thought about a pull but it was on him before he knew and ended up ducking late
Lee to Wright, no run this time it's fuller and Wright attempts a drive without remotely timing it
Lee to Wright, 1 run Wright finds bat on ball, almost in the middle as well. Punched to point and set off for a tight single
Lee to Trott, no run back of a length this time and Trott has to get right up on his toes to steer a defence to point
Watson to Wright, 2 runs Wright advances down the wicket and drives nicely deep into the off side
Watson to Wright, no run this is shorter and darts in a touch off the seam past Wright's attempted defence and it thuds into the pads
Watson to Wright, no run the shortish length invites a cut but it's too close to Wright so his chop it mistimed to third man
Watson to Wright, 1 run big drive attempted outside off but it comes of a thickish outside edge down to third man
Watson to Trott, 1 run Watson finds a middle stump line which allows Trott to flick a single to deep midwicket
Watson to Wright, 1 run Wright manages to get more bat on this, working into a gap at midwicket with soft hands
Bollinger to Wright, 2 runs starts around off stump and it's steered solidly to deep point
Bollinger to Wright, 1 run nicely played here, Wright getting back to a short ball and flipping a pull shot, up on one leg, to square leg
Bollinger to Trott, no run this is pushed across Trott who leaves alone outside off
Bollinger to Trott, 1 run short and a touch wide of off and it's slapped out to deep cover
Bollinger to Wright, FOUR runs Wright gets a half-volley and thumps it well, wide of mid-off all along the ground for four. Excellent shot there to bring up the 150
Bollinger to Wright, 1 run now he's on the back foot and steering past point
Watson to Wright, no run Watson fullish outside off stump and it darts through Wright's attempted cut
Watson to Wright, 1 run full again and straight, Wright aims to drive down the ground but an inside edge takes it through midwicket
Watson to Trott, no run slightly shorter here and Trott is forward in defence back to the bowler
Watson to Trott, no run attempted drive finds an inside edge that rolls gently to midwicket
Watson to Trott, no run full again and Trott working straight to midwicket
Watson to Trott, no run Trott keeps picking out the infield, Wright wants a single but there is nothing available
Bollinger to Wright, no run Bollinger steams in and shoves down a short ball that hurries through an attempted swipe
Bollinger to Wright, no run short again and this time Wright is up and dabbing into the onside, he wants a single but nothing available
Bollinger to Wright, 1 run enough width here for Wright to hack a bottom-handed drive square on the offside
Bollinger to Trott, no run Trott again finds mid-on, mistiming his drive to a fullish ball
Bollinger to Trott, 1 run this time Trott does pick off a single, shortish ball and he works it to square leg
Bollinger to Wright, 1 run another short ball and Wright thrashes a cut shot to deep point
Doherty to Wright, 1 run starts well, angling in from around off stump and Wright drives past the bowler

Doherty to Trott, no run Doherty does it again! Trott attempts a booming sweep from around off stump, missed it and was struck in front. He looks very out but wants a review... he's indeed been hit outside the line of off so Trott survives!
Doherty to Trott, 1 run Trott celebrates his reprieve by whipping a single to midwicket
Doherty to Wright, 1 run Wright gets a long way forward to block to cover and scuttle a single
Doherty to Trott, 1 run good lines from Doherty and Trott works a single again into the leg side
Doherty to Wright, no run Wright misses a forward defence and it bobbles off the pads into the leg side
Hastings to Trott, 1 run guided away off the face of the bat through the vacant cordon
Hastings to Wright, 1 run Wright drives hard outside off and gets another single from a thick edge to third man
Hastings to Trott, 1 wide bouncer, and it's a touch leg-sidey and too short, so it's called a wide
Hastings to Trott, no run slower ball now, and Trott waits on it and defends
Hastings to Trott, 1 run another slower one, this time wide of off and Trott cuts to the man in the deep

Hastings to Wright, 2 runs almost a chance! Oh, Wright has got away with one here as Hastings gets extra bounce and draws a thick edge, a leaping Haddin flies high and to his right and the ball just evades him, Lee at third man cuts off the boundary
Hastings to Wright, 1 run nudge and run this time as Wright gets a single to cover
Doherty to Wright, no run Doherty drifts it in to Wright, who pushes to cover and wants a run, Trott sends him back
Doherty to Wright, 1 run quicker and flatter, Wright gets a single through point
Doherty to Trott, no run Trott defends again as Doherty curves it in
Doherty to Trott, 1 run wider of off now and Trott drives to long-off
Doherty to Wright, 1 run quick single from Wright now, who pushes to cover
Doherty to Trott, no run Trott cuts hard but White at point hurls himself to his right and makes an excellent save
Hastings to Wright, no run defended away to the off side
Hastings to Wright, 1 run short of a length now and Wright cuts behind point for a single
Hastings to Trott, no run good slower ball and it nips in a bit, Trott tries to force through the off side but can't find a gap
Hastings to Trott, no run bouncer now and Trott ducks under it, but this one is judged as legal by the umpires
Hastings to Trott, 1 run there's the slower one again, Trott punches a single through cover point
Hastings to Wright, no run Wright can't get it away, tries to walk at Hastings but can only succeed in pushing it back to the bowler
Doherty to Trott, 1 run Trott pushes another single gently through mid-off
Doherty to Wright, no run Wright advances to Doherty but checks himself and pushes to off
Doherty to Wright, 1 run quickish again from Doherty, and it's pushed to the off side
Doherty to Trott, no run defended away safely
Doherty to Trott, 1 run a bit shorter now and he can only pull a single to deep midwicket
Doherty to Wright, 1 run good, soft hands as he pushes to midwicket

Hastings to Wright, no run great bounce again from Hastings, surprises Wright, who pushes to the off side, and Trott hares off for a single but is sent back, there is a genuine run-out chance as Clarke at point collects, but his throw hits the bat of the diving Trott
Hastings to Wright, FOUR runs there's the boundary England needed, their first in eight overs, as Wright cuts hard and behind point, finding the gap nicely
Hastings to Wright, OUT that's the end of Wright, he got a wider one and chased it with a big drive but gets a thin edge through to Haddin, Hastings gets the wicket he's been looking for
Hastings to Woakes, no run Woakes wafts outside off and this ball beats the bat
Hastings to Woakes, 1 run Woakes gets off the mark now with a clip through midwicket
Hastings to Trott, no run bouncer now and Trott doesn't chase it outside off
Doherty to Woakes, no run Woakes pushes behind point and can't find a gap
Doherty to Woakes, 3 runs this time Woakes does get it away through the gap at backward point, Watson does the chasing
Doherty to Trott, no run defended away to cover
Doherty to Trott, 1 run quickish ball curving in to Trott, who drives a single through mid-off
Doherty to Woakes, no run another drive, but this one goes straight to cover
Doherty to Woakes, no run ooh, almost a leading edge as Woakes tries to work it to leg, and checks his shot
Lee to Trott, 1 run half-volley to start with and it's driven wide of mid-off
Lee to Woakes, 2 runs well played by Woakes, he waits on this and cuts late enough to beat point, but forward enough to make fine leg do some running
Lee to Woakes, 1 run similar shot this time, although point was a bit finer and knocked it down during his dive
Lee to Trott, 1 run banged in shorter and it's guided off the face of the bat through the vacant cordon

Lee to Woakes, OUT there's Lee's second wicket, and Woakes again was trying to steer it to third man but this ball bounce more than he expected and nipped away a touch, he's got an edge through to Haddin
Lee to Shahzad, no run quick and full, Shahzad defends and thinks about a single, but decides against it
Hastings to Trott, 1 run slower ball again from Hastings, and Trott just cuts a single to deep point
Hastings to Shahzad, 1 leg bye wrong line now, down leg side and Shahzad gets it away fine, but not fine enough to beat Lee inside the circle
Hastings to Trott, 1 run fullish and straight, Trott drives uppishly but short of mid-off, he doesn't try to go over the top
Hastings to Shahzad, 1 run driven through cover but there's a man in the deep
Hastings to Trott, 1 run slower delivery and its yorker length, Trott just nudges a single to cover
Hastings to Shahzad, 1 wide oops! Hastings goes the slow bouncer but gets it a bit wrong, it's stuck in the hand and gone too short and wide - and is called as such
Hastings to Shahzad, 1 run Shahzad steers a single through cover
Hastings to Trott, 1 run slow bouncer from Hastings - very slow, in fact - and Trott pulls in the air just wide of midwicket, getting a single to the man in the deep
Hastings to Woakes, 1 run a good, quick single now as Woakes nudges to cover
Hastings to Trott, 1 run Hastings tries the slower shorter ball again, and once more Trott swats a single through midwicket
Hastings to Woakes, 1 run good line just on off stump, Woakes nudges to off and keeps rotating the strike
Hastings to Trott, 1 run goes for the yorker this time and Trott chips a single through midwicket
Hastings to Woakes, 1 run yet another single as Woakes just steers it wide of cover
Doherty to Woakes, 1 run Woakes advances to Doherty and drives another run to long-on
Doherty to Trott, no run tossed up on off and Trott can't find the gap at cover
Doherty to Trott, 1 run curves it in to Trott, who punches a single back past the bowler
Doherty to Woakes, 1 run pushed through cover this time
Doherty to Trott, 1 run Doherty flights this one more, and Trott pushes it through mid-off
Doherty to Woakes, no run fuller length now and it's steered away through mid-off again
Lee to Shahzad, no run banged in really short and straight! Good ball, but Shahzad is good enough to get bat on ball - even if it did lob uppishly away to the off side
Lee to Shahzad, no run and the slower bouncer this time, Shahzad can't get it away through the off side
Lee to Shahzad, 2 runs Shahzad backs away and Lee follows him, the batsman pulls it through midwicket though doesn't time it, and he picks up a couple

Lee to Shahzad, OUT and Shahzad is gone, Lee gets his third! Shahzad was trying to go over the top and make use of the Powerplay, he's lifted it towards mid-off and White didn't have to move far to his left to make the catch
Lee to Trott, 1 run he's just worked another single through square leg - there's no intensity here from Trott
Lee to Tremlett, no run banged in short and at the body, Tremlett rocks back and defends
Watson to Trott, 1 run Trott advances and then just drives to long-off

Watson to Tremlett, 1 run half a run-out chance here as Tremlett drops it at his feet and Trott wants the single - Watson collects and turns to throw, but he was off balance and missed by a long way at the non-striker's end
Watson to Trott, 2 runs Trott picks up two this time as he backs away and punches it back past the bowler, but the man in the deep cuts off the boundary
Watson to Trott, 1 run on middle and leg now and Trott makes his favourite walk across and flick through leg
Watson to Tremlett, no run defended away to point

Watson to Tremlett, OUT goodness me, this is shocking. Tremlett has run himself out in dreadful fashion. Pushed into the off side for what should have been an easy single. Tremlett dawdled, barely stretched to run his bat in. In the end his bat was over the line but in the air when the bails came off. Not even schoolboy that.
Gnasher McGlashan will have a bulletin to tell you, and maybe him, all about it. Elsewhere you can explore the fun of our YouTube channel. Join us at 18.30 for the resumption.

Well, run outs are normally the sign of a team off their pace. The innings was top and tailed with a pair of woeful run outs. In between Australia, marshalled superbly by Clarke, pulled off an excellent display. No England batsman got going, even Jonathan Trott who finished unbeaten on 84, unable to up the pace and intensity when needed to. Brett Lee was excellent, as was Xavier Doherty. England
Hello all, Sahil here. Can England make a game of this? It's a role reversal from the Ashes.
Shahzad to Watson, no run Shahzad starts fullish outside off stump, Watson, who is the key to this, leaves alone
Shahzad to Watson, FOUR runs Watson's away and it's simple for him. Gets a full ball on his pads which he fiddles around the corner for four
Shahzad to Watson, 1 run ooh, almost another chop on as Watson tried to cut a ball that was too close to him. Came off the bottom edge and bounced through to Prior
Shahzad to Haddin, no run Haddin has been struggling for form and misses out on a leg-side fiddle here. Thuds off the pads
Shahzad to Haddin, no run lovely delivery from Shahzad, nipped back from a length through bat and pad and struck Haddin high on the back leg
Shahzad to Haddin, no run this time it's left alone outside off stump. Welcome sighter for Haddin
Tremlett to Watson, no run Tremlett trundles in and bangs it down just short of a length, that's the place for him to bowl and the bounce takes it past the defence onto the pads
Tremlett to Watson, 1 wide this is very wide of off stump, Watson had a slash but didn't connect
Tremlett to Watson, no run back onto a good length and line this time. Watson very correct in defence
Tremlett to Watson, FOUR runs oh that is far, far too close! It was fuller from Tremlett and flew off this inside edge this far wide of leg stump and ran away for four
Tremlett to Marsh, no run good first ball to Marsh, on a length and and bouncing a touch, gets Marsh in an uncomfortable position as he tried to defend
Tremlett to Marsh, no run fuller and whipped off the pads to square leg, where Morgan slides to field well and aim a throw at the striker's end. Marsh was out of his crease then
Shahzad to Haddin, no run plenty of chat from the England fielders, I reckon they got a rocket from Strauss at the break. Shahzad is again outside off stump and Haddin leaves alone
Shahzad to Haddin, 1 run this nips back again from a length and Haddin helps it, with some inside edge, around the corner
Shahzad to Marsh, no run pushed across Marsh here and left all alone
Shahzad to Marsh, no run Marsh works this from around off stump to backwards square where some sliding fielding prevents one
Shahzad to Marsh, FOUR runs too full and the line is wrong, on the pads, Marsh's pick-up flick of the wrists is perfectly timed and it speeds to the square-leg rope
Shahzad to Marsh, 1 run on the legs again, England tried this approach the last game and Marsh made 110, this is worked again around the corner
Tremlett to Marsh, no run big grunt from Tremlett as he delivers, but that's the main event as an off-stump ball is left alone outside off
Tremlett to Marsh, 1 wide touch of swing here into Marsh, who shuffled across his stumps and missed a leg-side work, it went pretty much over leg stump and was called wide. Harsh call
Tremlett to Marsh, no run beaten outside off stump. Back of a length around off and Marsh flirted at it
Tremlett to Marsh, 1 run Tremlett lands it on a good length and it hurries onto Marsh who defends with soft hands
Tremlett to Haddin, no run Haddin is playing back to a ball he should be forward at which makes his defence looked jabbed
Tremlett to Haddin, FOUR runs ah lovely shot, the best of Haddin, sweetly timed past a diving point fielder for four. There was the slightest hint on offer and he took full advantage
Tremlett to Haddin, FOUR runs and another, even better this time. On the up Haddin has punched a length ball, with perfect timing, wide of mid-off to the boundary
Shahzad to Marsh, no run some smart fielding, diving at point, saves this steer into the off side
Shahzad to Marsh, 1 wide Shahzad from around the wicket digs in a short ball down the leg side. The umpire's don't like it, fair enough
Shahzad to Marsh, no run Shahzad corrects his line, length too, and Marsh leaves alone
Shahzad to Clarke, no run gets a very, very short ball first up. Clarke could have jumped and avoided that
Shahzad to Clarke, 2 runs Shahzad loses his line, slipping it down the leg side and Clarke helps it on its way to fine leg
Shahzad to Clarke, no run this time it's outside off stump and Clarke flings his arms in the air to leave alone
Tremlett to Haddin, no run Tremlett is hammering it down on a length and forcing Haddin back to defend
Tremlett to Haddin, no run touch of movement away from the bat, Haddin jumping back to defend with head over ball
Tremlett to Haddin, no run shorter from Tremlett, in another mood Haddin would have a go but here he sways out the way
Tremlett to Haddin, FOUR runs wow, Haddin got all of this! Skips down the wicket and leg side of the ball, got the length he wanted and sweetly thumped the ball over point
Tremlett to Haddin, no run Tremlett's response is to bang it in short and Haddin had to hurry to get out the way
Tremlett to Haddin, 1 run Haddin has found his timing, even this back-foot defence speeds out to mid-off
Shahzad to Haddin, FOUR runs Haddin is on the charge! Gives himself room again and eases his arms through the line, not perfectly timed but good enough to clear mid-off and run to the boundary
Shahzad to Haddin, no run much fuller this time, Shahzad searches for a yorker and it's carefully defended
Shahzad to Haddin, no run Haddin again aiming to slash over cover but this time it's bottom-edged and trickles to cover
Shahzad to Haddin, no run big whoosh outside off, looks good if it connects, less so when you miss
Shahzad to Haddin, 1 wide shoved down the leg side this time
Shahzad to Haddin, no run full ball is dug out back to Shahzad who collects and threatens to knock Haddin's block off. Haddin responded but I can't say with what
Shahzad to Haddin, no run full again and Haddin defends to cover. Plenty of chat out there
Tremlett to Clarke, no run Tremlett is a man of fewer words and lands this on a length, Clarke eases back to defend
Tremlett to Clarke, no run fuller, Tremlett seems to lose devil when he goes full, just floats it up there but at this stage in Clarke's innings it's left alone
Tremlett to Clarke, 1 run back of a length this time and Clarke stands tall to work past a short leg for a single
Tremlett to Haddin, 1 wide well Tremlett shoves the down the leg side. Trying to make sure Haddin has no room to free his arms but he's overcooked it
Tremlett to Haddin, no run beaten outside off, fullish and nipped away. Haddin should have been forward and ended up hanging his bat outside off
Tremlett to Haddin, no run this skews off the outer-half of the bat down to point
Tremlett to Haddin, 1 run Haddin aims a drive and it's a touch loose, sliding off the outer-half again to Bell sliding at point
Shahzad to Haddin, no run Shahzad's battle with Haddin continues with a length ball around off that's steered to point
Shahzad to Haddin, 1 run too much width allows Haddin to free his arms and cut to third man
Shahzad to Clarke, no run fuller this time and Clarke is not taking any risks at this stage, leaving well alone
Shahzad to Clarke, no run again this is up around off stump and Clarke shoulders arms

Shahzad to Clarke, no run massive scream from Shahzad as Clarke outside edges a drive one-bounce to Yardy who is very deep at slip. Shahzad has a pop at Clarke and then one at Yardy for being too deep! He's very fired up
Shahzad to Clarke, no run back of a length this time and Clarke defends more securely
Tremlett to Haddin, SIX runs wonderful strike! Haddin nailed this. Down the wicket and outside leg before easing the bat through the line and it pinged over cover for six!
Tremlett to Haddin, 1 run Tremlett continues to bowl a length and this time Haddin is happy to block with soft hands for a single to cover
Tremlett to Clarke, 2 runs Clarke gets a couple away through midwicket, getting deep into his crease to knock it away
Tremlett to Clarke, no run that's a cracker from Tremlett. Finds a good length and it zips away past Clarke's groping outside edge
Tremlett to Clarke, no run this time Clarke leaves alone outside off. It's been a good over so far but Haddin's invention manes Clarke has time
Tremlett to Clarke, 1 run worked off the pads wide of midwicket for a single. That could be Tremlett's spell
Woakes to Clarke, no run starts with a full ball that is drilled back at him
Woakes to Clarke, 1 run bit gentle here, fullish on leg stump and Clarke flicks it to deep midwicket
Woakes to Haddin, 2 runs Haddin is in the mood and even though he misjudged the length here he timed a check-drive with the straightest of bats down the ground
Woakes to Haddin, 1 run Haddin makes room ominously again but this time prods a single to point
Woakes to Clarke, 2 runs slid down the leg side and Clarke gets a leading edge that loops wide of mid-on
Tremlett to Haddin, 1 wide Tremlett continues, probably for White, but this is shoved down the leg side
Tremlett to Haddin, no run hint of extra bounce and away movement is wisely flagged through by Haddin
Tremlett to Haddin, no run slower ball this time and left all alone
Tremlett to Haddin, 1 run Tremlett aims fuller and a skewed drive bobbles out to mid-off to bring White on strike
Tremlett to White, 1 run not really a short ball, back of a length perhaps outside off stump and White steered it to third man
Tremlett to Haddin, 1 run this is straighter and pushed wide of mid-on for a jogged single
Tremlett to White, no run banged in short of a length but it doesn't really rear up and White has plenty of time to knock it into the off side
Woakes to Haddin, 1 run this is worked into space for an easy single
Woakes to White, no run back of a length once more around off stump and White defends
Woakes to White, no run similar length and line from Woakes, White has a while to get behind a defence
Woakes to White, no run touch fuller but White is hanging back which makes his pushed defence look strange
Woakes to White, no run excellent length and line from Woakes, heading for the top of off and forcing White to defend
Woakes to White, no run carefully defended once more from White. Excellent over really

Wright to Haddin, no run ooh, all sorts happening! Fullish ball which Haddin drives uppishly, one-bounce to mid-on, Strauss threw to the non-striker's end and White had hared up the crease before diving back full length
Wright to Haddin, no run good line and length here forces Haddin to block
Wright to Haddin, FOUR runs lovely shot, Haddin was itching for this. Gets leg side of the ball again and threw his arms through the line, pinged through the offside for four. Such sweet timing

Wright to Haddin, 1 run oh no dropped by Tremlett! Should have got it. Haddin looking to repeat his drive but mistimed it and it was dying on Tremlett as it arrived on him, couldn't get down properly and spilled the chance
Wright to White, no run White defends uneasily from the crease
Wright to White, no run carefully driven into the off side
Woakes to Haddin, no run driven to cover and can't find the gap
Woakes to Haddin, no run good accurate bowling, and Haddin punches to cover
Woakes to Haddin, 1 run quick single now as Haddin pushes firmly to mid-on and takes off
Woakes to White, no run White defends straight back to Woakes
Woakes to White, no run Woakes is bowling well this over, just peppering away at or just outside off, and White defends
Woakes to White, no run on the pads but White can only clip to mid-on
Wright to Haddin, 4 leg byes and there's a handy boundary for Australia, as Wright strays down leg side and Haddin makes sure he gets something on that, and it runs very fine just past Prior
Wright to Haddin, 1 run bouncer now and Haddin hooks it gently around the corner
Wright to White, no run White is really struggling to pierce the field here, and this time he nudges to cover
Wright to White, 1 run down leg side again, and White works a single through square leg

Wright to Haddin, FOUR runs and this time Haddin finds the gap behind square with his pull around the corner, Wright has been much too straight this over, trying to overcorrect and not allow Haddin to go over the off side
Wright to Haddin, 1 run another one angles down leg, and this time Haddin glances behind square
Woakes to Haddin, no run Haddin defends solidly now, he's pinned inside the crease with Prior up to the stumps
Woakes to Haddin, 1 run a single this time as Haddin late cuts and gets un under-edge into the turf, just wide of Prior
Woakes to White, no run pushed away to the off side

Woakes to White, 3 runs White is sick of being bogged down, and he launches everything at a big drive over the off side, getting it much higher than he intended but it lands safely in the outfield, not timed as he would have liked
Woakes to Haddin, 1 run Haddin, though, is in control, and he drives along the ground through mid-off
Woakes to White, 1 run White punches to point and takes off for a quick single, that's good running to keep the scoreboard ticking over
Yardy to White, no run cut away to point but can't find the gap
Yardy to White, no run White leans forward and defends
Yardy to White, no run Yardy angles it in to White, who defends
Yardy to White, 1 run White comes down the pitch now and just works a single through mid-on

Yardy to Haddin, FOUR runs lovely shot! The man at deep point had just that very ball come into the circle, and Haddin eased one, just steered it, forward of point and away to the newly vacated boundary
Yardy to Haddin, no run defended back down the pitch
PD Collingwood to White, no run White walks across and clunks it back to Collingwood
PD Collingwood to Hussey, 1 wide pushed well wide of off stump and Hussey leaves it, the umpire calls wide
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run Hussey leans across and defends to off
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run Collingwood angles it in again and it's defended back down the pitch
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run punched to cover and can't find the gap
PD Collingwood to Hussey, 1 run punched through cover and Hussey gets a single to get off the mark
Yardy to Hussey, 1 leg bye angled down leg and Hussey gets a tickle of pad on that, past Prior
Yardy to Haddin, no run defended away to the off side
Yardy to Haddin, no run pushed away defensively again
Yardy to Haddin, 1 run well done by Haddin to wait on this outside off and then dab a safe single through the vacant slips region
Yardy to Hussey, 1 run nudged away to point and Hussey gets a single
Yardy to Haddin, 1 run tossed up and curving in to leg, Haddin just eases a single down to long-on
PD Collingwood to Haddin, no run Haddin opens the face and runs it to short third man, can't find a run
PD Collingwood to Haddin, no run defended back down the pitch
PD Collingwood to Haddin, no run good, accurate stuff from Collingwood and Haddin can only defend
PD Collingwood to Haddin, 1 run deftly done by Haddin, dabs this fine enough to get a single but third man gets across to cut it off
PD Collingwood to Hussey, 1 run Hussey pushes quite hard to mid-off but is confident there's a run there, and indeed, there is
Yardy to Hussey, 1 run Hussey clips a single down to long-on
Yardy to Smith, no run good curve in from Yardy coming around the wicket, and Smith defends
Yardy to Smith, 1 run on the toes and Smith clips through square leg to get off the mark
Yardy to Hussey, no run Hussey leans forward and waits on this one, then dead-bats into the ground
Yardy to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to work through midwicket but finds the fielder
Yardy to Hussey, no run half a thought of a single here as Hussey nudges to cover, then decides against the run
PD Collingwood to Smith, no run Collingwood attacks the stumps and gives Smith nothing, all he can do is defend
PD Collingwood to Smith, no run fuller now and Smith drives to cover
PD Collingwood to Smith, no run Smith opens the face now and tries to run it fine but gully gets across to save it
PD Collingwood to Smith, 1 run similar shot now but more forceful from Smith, and he gets a single to third man
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run punched back past the bowler and it's collected at mid-off
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to flick through leg but finds the man at midwicket
Yardy to Smith, 1 run full toss and it's clipped through midwicket
Yardy to Hussey, no run Yardy strolls in, tongue waggling like he's Brad Hogg, and drifts it in to Hussey, who defends
Yardy to Hussey, 1 run driven down past mid-on
Yardy to Smith, no run Smith leans forward with bat and pad, and defends
Yardy to Smith, no run curving in again, and Smith defends watchfully
Yardy to Smith, no run another one defended safely to off
PD Collingwood to Hussey, 2 runs immediately Hussey calls 'two, two, two' as he punches through cover, and they run hard and indeed get the two runs
PD Collingwood to Hussey, 1 leg bye down leg side now and Hussey gets a leg bye
PD Collingwood to Smith, no run defended again, a tad uppishly, but safely to the leg side

PD Collingwood to Smith, SIX runs yes, it was only a matter of time before Smith decided to go after a ball, and he's got enough on it over square leg! He's just slogged that, lifting it high and just over the rope
PD Collingwood to Smith, no run and he's back into solid defence, bat and pad close together
PD Collingwood to Smith, no run again Smith defends as Collingwood sends down a slower - that is to say, even slower - ball
Shahzad to Hussey, no run left alone outside off stump
Shahzad to Hussey, no run probing outside off and Hussey tries to drive through mid-on, can't find the gap
Shahzad to Hussey, no run ah, edgy! Angles it in to the stumps and Hussey just gets a leading edge away to point, not where he intended that to go
Shahzad to Hussey, 1 run bangs it in short but doesn't quite get the direction right, and Hussey slaps a single out through cover point
Shahzad to Smith, no run good line just outside off, and Smith leaves it alone
Shahzad to Smith, no run good yorker and Smith keeps it out
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run really accurate from Collingwood, and Hussey defends
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run Hussey misses this one but nobody is interested in an lbw shout, it was a bit too high
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run Hussey defends back down the pitch
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run Hussey goes for the drive now but straight to the man at cover
PD Collingwood to Hussey, 2 runs Hussey finds the gap now and cuts wide of third man, who gets across but can't prevent the second run
Shahzad to Smith, 1 run Smith joins Hussey in double figures now with a slapped pull through square leg
Shahzad to Hussey, 1 run another late cut as Hussey just guides it behind point
Shahzad to Smith, no run good bounce and carry through to Prior as Smith leaves it alone

Shahzad to Smith, FOUR runs very good shot! That's a forceful square drive, hit on the up but safely behind point, and with enough timing that third man has no hope of getting across to prevent that reaching the boundary
Shahzad to Smith, 2 runs fuller this time and Smith drives to mid-on, and there's a direct hit at the non-striker's end with Smith safely in his ground, and the deflection allows an overthrow
Shahzad to Smith, no run left alone outside off, and that ends a good over for the Australians, who now are within 90 of victory
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run defended away to the off side
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run again Hussey watchfully pushes to the off side, not in any hurry to go after Collingwood
PD Collingwood to Hussey, 1 run on the back foot now, Hussey forces a single through midwicket
PD Collingwood to Smith, 1 run on the pads of Smith, who clips through square leg, and he's starting to look reasonably fluent
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run good length from Collingwood, Hussey just defends
PD Collingwood to Hussey, 1 run flicked through midwicket for another single and Hussey continues to work himself in, slowly

Woakes to Hussey, FOUR runs well played, that's Hussey's first boundary as Woakes dishes up a half-volley to start with, Hussey drives confidently through the gap at cover and it runs away to the rope
Woakes to Hussey, 1 run pushed away to point and finds a quick single
Woakes to Smith, no run angled in to Smith, who takes a big stride forward and defends with the bat right under his nose
Woakes to Smith, 1 run Smith waits on this one and runs it fine to third man, a touch risky as the ball was angling in and it could easily be played on, but he got it away safely in the end
Woakes to Hussey, no run bouncer, and Hussey ducks it
Woakes to Hussey, 1 run punched through cover and they pick up another single
Yardy to Hussey, FOUR runs good shot from Hussey, he's used the feet nicely to back away and forces a sort of back-foot drive through cover, finding the gap and collecting his second boundary30
Yardy to Hussey, 1 run pushed down towards mid on
Yardy to Smith, FOUR runs smashed through point! Not a great delivery as Yardy drops a bit short and wide, and Smith latches on to it, cutting hard and finding another boundary
Yardy to Smith, no run pushed back to the bowler
Yardy to Smith, 1 run Smith nudges a quick single to off now
Yardy to Hussey, 1 run drifting in and trying to tempt Hussey, but he patiently pushes another single through cover point
Woakes to Hussey, 2 runs good placement again as Hussey cuts late and beats point, and quick running ensures that he picks up two despite the ball racing to Shahzad at third man
Woakes to Hussey, FOUR runs oh yes, much better shot now as Hussey cuts hard and it sears away to the boundary, that was too short and wide but Hussey still had to put it away, and he did
Woakes to Hussey, no run pushed back past the bowler and decides against a risky single
Woakes to Hussey, 1 run well steered just wide of short cover, and they pick up a single
Woakes to Smith, no run straight-bat defence from Smith as Woakes goes wide of the crease and angles it in
Woakes to Smith, no run attacking the stumps and Smith defends again
Yardy to Hussey, no run Yardy bowled a load of filth in his last over and starts this one much better, tossing it up on a length and Hussey defends
Yardy to Hussey, 1 run quicker ball that Hussey milks down the ground off the back foot
Yardy to Smith, 1 run too short from Yardy and a cut shot runs away to deep point
Yardy to Hussey, 2 runs driven slightly uppishly but wide of any inflielder for a couple
Yardy to Hussey, no run flicked firmly to short miwicket
Yardy to Hussey, 1 run touch of width and cut firmly out to deep cover
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run starts a touch short but gets away with it as the cut finds point
PD Collingwood to Hussey, 1 run back of a length once again and Hussey can happily drive off the back foot
PD Collingwood to Smith, no run Smith has played awfully well today and clips to short midwicket
PD Collingwood to Smith, no run carefully pushed away to point
PD Collingwood to Smith, 1 run half a foot of width allows Smith to slide this off the face to third man
PD Collingwood to Hussey, no run driven firmly to cover to end the over
Yardy to Smith, no run Smith up the wicket but only to defend
Yardy to Smith, 1 run now Smith is down on one knee, dabbing a sweep around the corner
Yardy to Hussey, no run driven off the back foot to cover
Yardy to Hussey, no run short cover this time pounces to save a single
Yardy to Hussey, 1 run worked around the corner off the back foot
Yardy to Smith, no run another excellent stop from Collingwood at short cover prevents runs from a well-timed drive
Tremlett to Hussey, no run starts well, short of a length around off stump, carefully pushed to cover
Tremlett to Hussey, no run again Tremlett finds a good off-stump line and Hussey is fully behind it. When he blocks them, they stay blocked
Tremlett to Hussey, no run this nibbles away a touch from around off stump. Hussey gets leg side of the ball to defend
Tremlett to Hussey, no run fuller ball, Tremlett invites a drive which Hussey doesn't time and it bobbles to cover
Tremlett to Hussey, 1 run nips back this time, onto the inside edge and it runs away around the corner for a single
Yardy to Hussey, 1 run Yardy continues, thought Shahzad might have a burst, pushed gently down to long-on to bring Hastings on strike
Yardy to Hastings, 1 run Hastings shuffles to the off side and pokes a single to square leg
Yardy to Hussey, no run fiddled off the leading edge back to the bowler
Yardy to Hussey, 2 runs some good fielding at fine leg stops this on the rope
Yardy to Hussey, no run pushed gently back to the bowler, hint of inside edge there
Yardy to Hussey, no run steered to cover off the back foot to end a slightly innocuous over
Tremlett to Hastings, no run Tremlett runs in hard and hits back of a length forcing Hastings back to defend
Tremlett to Hastings, FOUR runs poor ball is punished! Top work from Hastings. Short and a touch wide, cut powerfully past point and beats third man
Tremlett to Hastings, no run Tremlett returns to a straighter line, better length too and solidly defended
Tremlett to Hastings, 1 run ooh, this is edged but all along the carpet, past Collingwood flinging himself at point and down to third man
Tremlett to Hussey, no run Tremlett again finds the outside edge but it's thickish and runs to backward point
Tremlett to Hussey, no run cracker to finish. Pitches back of a length around off stump and seams away past the hapless outside edge of Hussey
Yardy to Hastings, no run tidy enough, tossed up on a length and patted back to the bowler
Yardy to Hastings, no run poked into the leg side
Yardy to Hastings, no run bit short and Hastings has too long to cut so can't time it
Yardy to Hastings, no run short again and it's cracked straight to cover
Yardy to Hastings, no run fuller ball and it's very gently patted to mid-on
Yardy to Hastings, 1 run one short ball too many and this time it's cut wide of cover but only for a single. No real damage done but England need more
Shahzad to Hastings, 1 run bustles in but can't find much pace or swing here and is easily pushed wide of cover
Shahzad to Hussey, no run Hussey defends with bat away from body but solidly
Shahzad to Hussey, no run slower ball this time, held deep his hands and driven to cover
Shahzad to Hussey, 1 run another slower ball, touch short and Hussey had to reach for it outside off, ended up toe-ending towards cover
Shahzad to Hastings, 1 wide banged in short, too short for anyone's liking
Shahzad to Hastings, no run better bouncer this time, forcing Hastings to hop back and defend
Shahzad to Hastings, no run Shahzad short and gets this up to Hasting's neck. The batsman jumps to try and drop this back down the pitch
Yardy to Hussey, 1 run Yardy continues and allows a simple drive down the ground
Yardy to Hastings, 1 run a good parry from Strauss at short cover keeps this to a single as it's cut firmly
Yardy to Hussey, no run forward defence trickles off the inside edge
Yardy to Hussey, 2 runs good running here turns one into two. It was short and cut to deep point
Yardy to Hussey, no run driven out to extra cover to end the over
Shahzad to Hastings, no run Shahzad bangs in another short ball which Hastings easily pops under
Shahzad to Hastings, no run back of a length and carefully blocked into the off side
Shahzad to Hastings, 1 wide slower ball bouncer but Shahzad gets the line wrong and it bobbles away down the leg side
Shahzad to Hastings, no run short once more, not had much in his half, Hastings. Blocked to the covers
Shahzad to Hastings, no run but it's short, too short to find an edge. Hastings up on his toes to defend
Shahzad to Hastings, 1 run finally it's a touch fuller and it slides off the face down to third man
Shahzad to Hussey, no run yorker to finish. Touch overcooked and it ended up a low full toss. Bunted to mid-on
PD Collingwood to Hastings, no run starts very straight and it's patted back to the bowler
PD Collingwood to Hastings, 2 runs ooh, almost pulled off another breakthrough. Scooped mistimed drive plopped into space around cover
PD Collingwood to Hastings, no run back of a length and pushed to cover
PD Collingwood to Hastings, 1 run slower ball, if he can bowl them any slower, driven wide of mid-on
PD Collingwood to Hussey, 1 run another single milked out to deep cover
PD Collingwood to Hastings, 1 run unfussy drive past Collingwood earns a jogged single. Not much urgency but there's no need for it
Shahzad to Hastings, 1 wide slower bouncer, outside of off stump. Shahzad is unimpressed with the umpire who calls wide, fair enough really because it wasn't far from off stump
Shahzad to Hastings, 1 wide now thisis a wide, shoved down the leg side
Shahzad to Hastings, no run beaten outside off stump this time. Shahzad fired it in a touch short and it whizzed past the attempted cut
Shahzad to Hastings, 1 run solid bat on ball this time, driven crisply to deep cover
Shahzad to Hussey, no run back of a length again and it's cut firmly to point
Shahzad to Hussey, FOUR runs glorious drive, it was there for it, but Hussey leant into a sweet drive wide of mid-off for four
Shahzad to Hussey, FOUR runs banged in short and Hussey's on the pull, didn't get all over it but found the gap and it trickled over the rope
Shahzad to Hussey, no run full this time and another crisp drive but it finds cover
Woakes to Hastings, no run starts well enough around off stump and it's steered to point
Woakes to Hastings, 1 leg bye Woakes strangles a shout as this thuds into the pads but it was heading down leg
Woakes to Hussey, 1 run fuller delivery is dug out to mid-on
Woakes to Hastings, 1 run bunted down the ground, no timing, there hasn't been much all day
Woakes to Hussey, no run steered off the back foot towards point
Woakes to Hussey, 1 run Hussey steals a single pushing a single to mid-off
Tremlett to Hussey, FOUR runs Tremlett is given the honour of bowling with the field up and starts with a slower ball that is duly driven beautifully over mid-off for four
Tremlett to Hussey, no run Just a boundary needed but Hussey blocks to point
Tremlett to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to mow a ball that was a touch too full and it goes through to Prior
Tremlett to Hussey, no run nothing on offer as Tremlett finds a length on off stump. Pushed to cover
Tremlett to Hussey, 1 run short ball is pulled down to deep midwicket
Tremlett to Hastings, 2 runs that'll be all! Hastings finishes the game by cracking a short ball to third man

Australia win by four wickets Australia go 3-0 up, their fourth win in a row. After a wobble chasing England's modest total David Hussey with Steve Smith firstly and then John Hastings have steered them to a comfortable victory. Australia's bowlers, led by Brett Lee and backed up by Xavier Doherty, set up the victory. England didn't do much right today and now need to win an unlikely four games
Australia won by 4 wickets (with 24 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Brett Lee, AUS
